text: Matched is a 2010 dystopian novel by Ally Condie. The book was followed by two sequels, 'Crossed' and Reached. Matched tells the story of seventeen-year-old Cassia Reyes. She lives in a world where at age seventeen, everyone is matched with who they will marry. In this world, people marry at age 21, have children at age 24, and die at age 80. However, despite being matched, Cassia finds that she loves someone else. Category:Books by Ally Condie Category:2010 books
title: Matched (book)
